description: The purpose of the amendment is to extend the deadline to schedule the 1 to 1 Virtual Industry Days session.
full_summary:
**Propulsion Group J85 CAN-40 Tender**
=====================================

**Request For Information**
---------------------------

The Department of National Defence, through Public Works and Government Services Canada, invites all interested suppliers to submit a bid for the [Victoria (PG T) ]56-CAN-40J85] Propulsion Group.

**Tender Information**
---------------------

*   **Tender Reference Number:** PW-BB-209-28826
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8485-23SA01/B
*   **Publication Date:** October 4, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** October 14, 2022, at 14:00 ET (expired)
*   **GSIN Code:** *JX2840A - Gas Turbines and Jet Engines, Aircraft, and Components - Repair and Overhaul (Military)
*   **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
*   **Competitive Procurement Method:** *Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** *Proceeds of the contract will take place in Saskatchewan

**Contract Award Criteria**
---------------------------

*   By Trade Agreement: *Under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Document Information**
------------------------

*   [Notice of Intent to Enter into a Contract](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/03/2e4650a4934af78f6b22070c905949c8/ABES.PROD.PW__BB.B209.E28826.EBSU000.PDF)
*   [Addendum (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/11/d859c214c7b4512fcae9f05c83654168/ABES.PROD.PW__BB.B209.F28826.EBSU001.PDF)

**Queries and Further Information**
-----------------------------------

For further information and detailed specifications, please refer to the attached documents.

**Government Agency Information**
-------------------------------

*   **Contracting Organization:** [Public Works and Government Services Canada](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html)
*   **Contact Information:** 
    *   **Name:** Sylvain Desbois
    *   **Email:** <sylvain.desbois@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *   **Phone:** *819-962-8660
